name: Trollface Quest
storyline: Trollface Quest is a game known for its strange characters and the complete lack of sense and logic where the player must complete some levels, figuring out how to get through each one by clicking on characters and objects in the scenarios. You should think about where to click to see what happens.
summary: Are you bored with some standard quests? Try the one that will make you laugh and marvel every time you reach a new level! Even if you are an experienced player and solve all the quest puzzles like a pro, you will need to make your brain work hard to get through the levels of the original Trollface game. Don't look for a standard solution! Be ready to activate your creativity and logic!
